AVICII

I probably don't need to tell you who this man was. One of the most incredible person on the Earth has passed away on 20 April 2018.

He is one of the most inspiring person to me with his beautiful songs and extreme talent. If you interested in his life you can read more about him on the Wikipedia page, and listen his music visit his Tracklist.

I know that I suppose to show his timeline here, but I think this person has deserved more than just a few lines sorted in a list.

The Timeline

  • September 8, 1989 - in Stockholm, Sweden
  • 2007 - Avicii signed with a label, Dejfitts plays
  • 2010 - "Seek Bromanace" achieved the top 20 status in several countries
  • 2011 - "Levels" was released, which launched him into the mainstream and superstardom
  • 2012 - His collab with David Guetta, "Sunshine" and "levels" were nominated for grammys
  • 2012 - Headline Ultra music Festival for the first time
  • 2013 - True era unfolded, including "wake me up" and "Hey brother"
  • 2014 - bergling announced he had been hospitalized
  • 2014 - Stayed busy in studio. working on 70 songs for his next album stories
  • 2015 - Stories released
  • 2016 - Avicii played his last show in ibiza, before retiring from touring
  • 2017 - His six-tracks EP Avici(01) wass unleashed
  • 2017 - Avicii: True stories documentry releashed
  • April 20,2018 - Avicii died at the age of 28 in muscat, Oman
